chickenGPT: Ferdinand the frog 🐸 croaked, "Chirp! 10 PM! Medicine time!" Pip, a fluffy chick🐥, groaned. Every. Single. Night. One night, Pip was engrossed in a seed-pecking competition with a worm🐛. "Ribbit?" Ferdinand prompted. Silence. Pip, covered in dirt and victorious, fell asleep instantly. The next morning, Pip woke up with a beak-sized cold 🤧. Ferdinand just stared, then croaked, "Ribbit…I told you so." 😒
